document_data.mainbody:
ezlentyr Villa was the family estate of the Waterdhavian noble house Dezlentyr.
The villa was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward on the southeast corner of where Feather Street and Delzorin Street joined.
The walled compound contained three separate buildings. Two of the buildings were much larger than the last. Each building stood between two and four stories tall.
